  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92732</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92732</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">L'angle de réflexion d'un miroir</string>
            <string language="en">The angle of mirror reflection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Winkel der Spiegelreflexion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O ângulo da reflexão do espelho</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'angolo della riflessione dello specchio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η γωνία της αντανάκλασης καθρεφτών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El ángulo de la reflexión del espejo</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve qu'un miroir réfléchira la lumière suivant le même angle que la lumière lorsque celle-ci frappe le miroir.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that a mirror will reflect light in the same angle as the light strikes the mirror.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">angle d'incidence</string>
            <string language="en">angle of incidence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion sur un miroir</string>
            <string language="en">mirror reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">angle de réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">reflection angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß ein Spiegel Licht im 
gleichen Winkel reflektiert, dem das Licht den Spiegel anschlägt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que um espelho 
refletirá a luz no mesmo ângulo que a luz golpeia o espelho.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che uno specchio 
rifletterà la luce nello stesso angolo come la luce colpisce lo 
specchio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι ένας καθρέφτης θα 
απεικονίσει το φως στην ίδια γωνία όπως το φως χτυπά τον 
καθρέφτη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que un espejo reflejará
la luz en el mismo ángulo que la luz pulso el espejo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einfallswinkel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiegelreflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion Winkel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ângulo de incidência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reflexão do espelho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ângulo da reflexão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">angolo dell'incidenza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riflessione dello specchio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">angolo di riflessione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γωνία της πρόσπτωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντανάκλαση καθρεφτών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γωνία αντανάκλασης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ángulo de la incidencia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reflexión del espejo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ángulo de la reflexión</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
